-Five rows of cards are put into a pyramid shaped setup with the cardbacks facing upwards, and the player will pick one of the cards at the bottom row of the pyramid. If the card is not a face card (jack, queen or king) the game will go on and the player will pick another card at the row above, and the game will continue in this fashion until the player reach the top of the pyramid or picks a face card.


-When a player gets to the top of the pyramid they are awarded with one point.


-The player who get five points first wins the game.
%2s picked a face card and is not getting any points this turn
%4s won the game by reaching 5 points! \n\nThank you for playing!
